Text: For people wondering where Ghost Adventures has gone it will be back with a new series starting in September. And you will get 34 episodes in the next series. Travel channel has confirmed.

Nicky is correct.  What many of you thought was S05E01, E02, E03 was actually the end of Season 4.

Actually, I think it was the end of Season 3.
http://www.tvguide.com/tvshows/ghost-adventures/episodes/295609

Oh well, since we've screwed up the episode numbering for so long I have no choice but to continue screwing it up.  This September's Ghost Adventures will be S05E01 (even though it SHOULD be S04E01 and I've already released a S05E01 because so many people have whined and sniveled to me about it saying that's what it should be when all along they were wrong).
